thread.title: YouTube star 'has sex with best mate's sister' in brutal prank - and pal goes predictably nuts
thread.title_full: YouTube star 'has sex with best mate's sister' in brutal prank - and pal goes predictably nuts

author: Lucy Clarke-Billings
title: YouTube star 'has sex with best mate's sister' in brutal prank - and pal goes predictably nuts
text:
YouTube star took banter to the next level by duping his best friend into thinking he was in the middle of a steamy sex session with his sister. 
Joel Morris, known by his online gaming name JMX, published a video of him pranking his pal. 
The 18-year-old explains at the beginning of the clip that he is going to pretend to have sex with fellow Vlogger MaxPlays’s sister. 
Another friend – Josh – then texts Max to tell him that Joel is in bed with his sister. 
Joel then sets up cameras on the bed before the pair get under the sheets in position. Read More The daring prank could had potential to go horribly wrong (Photo: JMX/Youtube) Scantily clad Joel had the last laugh (Photo: JMX/Youtube) There was an altercation before the reality of the situation became apparent (Photo: JMX/Youtube) The sister was in on the joke (Photo: JMX/Youtube) 
Predictably, his friend storms into the room screaming: “Get out of bed Joel, get out of bed. 
“You’re actually a scumbag, you’re actually a f***ing scumbag. 
“I told you – you can’t bang my f***ing sister.” Read More 
With that, he rips away the bed covers, sees his sister is still clothed and realised he has been tricked. 
More than 460,000 people have viewed the clip since it was posted on Sunday. Like us on Facebook
